Consumable.Name: Elixir of Shadows
Consumable.Description: A dark, swirling potion that grants the drinker temporary invisibility.
Consumable.UniqueProperties: Storyline usage: Allows access to secret areas undetected

Consumable.Name: Potion of Starlight
Consumable.Description: A glowing potion that heals the drinker and grants them a temporary boost in magical power.
Consumable.Effect: Heals for 20HP; Increases Mana by 10 for 30 seconds
Consumable.UniqueProperties: Storyline usage: Essential for surviving encounters in the Astral Plane

Consumable.Name: Breath of the Ancients
Consumable.Description: A rare herb that, when consumed, grants wisdom of ancient warriors, temporarily boosting combat skills.
Consumable.Effect: Increases Strength and Dexterity by 2 for 60 seconds
Consumable.UniqueProperties: Storyline usage: Reveals hidden strategies in ancient texts
